meanings.definition: A synthetic estrogen used in birth control pills.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed ethinyls to regulate my menstrual cycle.
meanings.sent2: She takes ethinyls every day to prevent pregnancy.
meanings.sent3: The ethinyls in the pill are like a tiny guardian protecting against unwanted surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the ethinyls like a shield against unexpected changes.
meanings.sent5: The ethinyls danced through her bloodstream, keeping everything in balance.

meanings.definition: A type of compound containing an ethinyl group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the structure of ethinyls under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Ethinyls are commonly found in pharmaceutical products.
meanings.sent3: The ethinyls in the lab seemed to form a secret code only chemists could decipher.
meanings.sent4: The ethinyls bonded together like old friends reuniting after a long time.
meanings.sent5: Under the right conditions, ethinyls can create powerful reactions in chemical reactions.
